name: Bip and Spark
description:
Intro

You are Bip, a small Darkslime that lives deep in the caves. One day a swarm of fireflies fly across Bips' home and awaken him. part of that swarm was Spark, but he got lost. Now Bip and Spark go on an adventure together through these caves in order to find Sparks' family.

  

Gameplay

Bip lives in the caves and feels comfortable traversing the uneven terrain.

 

Stick to Any surface:

Bip has the ability to stick to any surface he touches. Gravity is no problem for him. Stick to walls ceilings and much more.

 

Super Jump:

Bip can compress his mass and release it all in a powerful and precise Jump. Focus, aim, and Jump, to reach surfaces that seem out of reach.

 

Dash:

Bip can channel the power of the fireflies to make one dash in the air. He's able to reach spots he normally wouldn't get to.

Call of the Firefly:

Bip can make callouts to fireflies and get their attention. This builds trust between you and Spark
